# Introduction to Shiny

Shiny is an R package that allows users to build interactive web apps directly in R. Itâ€™s especially useful in digital marketing analytics for creating real-time data dashboards and reports.

## Key Components
- **UI (User Interface)**: Controls layout and inputs/outputs
- **Server**: Processes data and creates reactivity
- **Reactivity**: Updates outputs when inputs change

## Example Shiny App

```{r}
library(shiny)
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("User Selection Example"),
  sliderInput("num", "Choose a number", 1, 100, 50),
  textOutput("result")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$result <- renderText({
    paste("You selected:", input$num)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
